methods.addGrouping:
Add a mapping from value [firstKey, lastKey] to the groupings under construction.

:param value: (RandomGroupingBuilder.DATA_TYPE) - The value for the grouping
:param firstKey: (long) - The first key in the range
:param lastKey: (long) - The last key in the range
methods.getGroupToIndex:
Get the groupings under construction in a form usable by AbstractColumnSource implementations.

:return: (java.util.Map<RandomGroupingBuilder.DATA_TYPE,io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index>) A mapping from grouping value to its matching Index

text:
Builder for constructing groupings from one or more <value, key range> pairs, with no requirement that
 key ranges be sequential.
